price: Akatoa ndani yake maji yake na malisho yake,
footnotes: Akatoa ndani yake maji yake yanayo tibuka katika chemchem zake, na ikamiminika mito yake, na ikawa na mimea yake ya chakula kwa ajili ya watu na wanyama;

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
